text: Phir jab woh (bacha) itni umar ko phoncha kay uss kay sath chalay phiray to uss (ibrahim alh-e-salam) ney kaha meray piyaray bachay! Mein khuwab mein apnay aap ko tujhay zibah kertay huyey dekh raha hun. Abb tu bata kay teri kiya raye hai? Betay ney jawab diya kay abba! Jo hukum hua hai ussay baja layiye inshaAllah aap mujhay sabar kerney walon mein say payen gay
